keyMappings:
# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
#   Carlisia's Vimium Config
#   Mapped from Neovim muscle memory
# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

# ── Buffers → Tabs ────────────────────────────────────────────
# Neovim: ]b/[b (mini.bracketed), <M-Tab>, <leader>x
map ]b        nextTab
map [b        previousTab
map <space>x  removeTab
map <space>bn createTab
map <space>bt visitPreviousTab
map X         restoreTab

# ── Leader-Style Commands ─────────────────────────────────────
# Mirroring <space> leader patterns

# smart open   (<leader><space>):
map <space><space> Vomnibar.activate      
# find files   (<leader>ff):       
map <space>ff      Vomnibar.activateInNewTab  
# recent tabs  (<leader>fr) :    
map <space>fr      Vomnibar.activateTabSelection   
# bookmarks    (<leader>fc):
map <space>fc      Vomnibar.activateBookmarks      

# ── Search ────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# Grep style (<leader>fg)
map <space>fg enterFindMode

# ── Link Hints ────────────────────────────────────────────────
# f/F are Vimium defaults; adding go-to-definition style
map <space>ld LinkHints.activateMode
map <space>li LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab

# ── Copy / Yank ──────────────────────────────────────────────
# Matches <leader>fy yank-all style
map <space>fy copyCurrentUrl
map <space>fp openCopiedUrlInCurrentTab
map <space>fP openCopiedUrlInNewTab

# ── URL Navigation ───────────────────────────────────────────
# <leader>go opens in browser — here, navigate up the path
map <space>go goToRoot
map <space>gu goUp

# ── Scroll ───────────────────────────────────────────────────
# J/K default to tab switching — remap to full-page scroll
# (tab switching already covered by ]b / [b)
unmap J
unmap K
map J scrollFullPageDown
map K scrollFullPageUp

# ── Toggles ──────────────────────────────────────────────────
map \z toggleViewSource
map \p togglePinTab

# ── Marks ────────────────────────────────────────────────────
map <space>sm Marks.activateCreateMode
map <space>gm Marks.activateGotoMode

# ── Visual Mode ──────────────────────────────────────────────
map <space>sv enterVisualMode
map <space>sV enterVisualLineMode

# ── Help ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────
map <space>h showHelp
map <space>k showHelp
map <space>? createTab https://github.com/carlisia/dotfiles/blob/main/vimium/README.md
map ?        showHelp
searchEngines:
# ── Search Engines ─────────────────────────────────────────────
g:   https://www.google.com/search?q=%s                            Google
d:   https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s                                       DuckDuckGo

# ── Go ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
go:  https://pkg.go.dev/search?q=%s                                Go Packages
gd:  https://pkg.go.dev/%s                                                 Go Docs Direct
gp:  https://go.dev/play/p/%s                                             Go Playground
gs:  https://gobyexample.com/#%s                                   Go By Example

# ── GitHub ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────
gh:  https://github.com/search?q=%s&type=repositories              GitHub Repos
gi:  https://github.com/search?q=%s&type=issues                       GitHub Issues
gc:  https://github.com/search?q=%s&type=code                        GitHub Code
gv:  https://github.com/%s                                                            GitHub Go To Repo

# ── Teleport ───────────────────────────────────────────────────
tp:  https://github.com/gravitational/teleport/search?q=%s         Teleport Code
ti:  https://github.com/gravitational/teleport/issues?q=%s           Teleport Issues
td:  https://goteleport.com/docs/search/?q=%s                           Teleport Docs

# ── Reference ──────────────────────────────────────────────────
w:   https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s           Wikipedia
so:  https://stackoverflow.com/search?q=%s                                                              StackOverflow
rd:  https://www.reddit.com/search/?q=%s                                                                  Reddit
yt:  https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s                                            YouTube

# ── Usage examples (hit 'o' then type) ─────────────────────────
#
#   go io Reader                                     → search Go packages for io Reader
#   gd net/http                                        → jump directly to net/http docs
#   gv gravitational/teleport                    → jump straight to a repo
#   gc teleport discovery                        → search code across all of GitHub
#   tp DiscoveryService                         → search Teleport repo specifically
#   so golang context cancel                 → StackOverflow for Go questions
#
#   gv is basically cd for GitHub. Type gv carlisia/dotfiles
#   and you're there.
